footer.text: By helping immigrants in their full and successful integration into the United States, we help people achieve their goals and pursue their dreams.

index.caract-text-1: We organize various in-person seminars so you can continue your tax training in different cities across the country, such as Los Angeles, Orlando, Houston, Phoenix, San Diego, New York, Miami, etc.
index.caract-text-2: Most of our courses can be taken live, allowing interaction with the instructor and ensuring the content is always up to date.
index.caract-text-3: We offer all our courses in On-Demand format so you can study whenever, wherever, and however you prefer. All courses are continuously updated.
index.caract-text-4: We offer a comprehensive collection of tax books that are constantly updated and edited to reflect the latest fiscal changes and developments.
index.teachers-subtitle: We have the best teachers who will help you take it to the next level
index.memberships-title: Discover how we can help you
index.memberships-subtitle: We have the right solution for every person
index.membership-text-1: Learn from professionals with over 30 years of experience. Join our 2,500+ successful students and start your own business.
index.membership-text-2: Already have experience as a tax preparer and want to take it to the next level? With our <strong>Business Lab Membership<strong> you'll have everything you need to reach the top.
